intro: ^Don’t you just love the noise of construction in the morning? Breathe in the sawdust, let it take you away to better places.
talk_dialog: ^Eh? What’s that? I can’t hear you past the construction noises! Isn’t it beautiful? It’s like I’m being serenaded by drills and hammers!
leave_dialog: ^Suit yourself! Dum, dum, dum, brrr, kssst- bvvvt. Hey, did you like that? It was my vocal adaptation of the guys back there. Here I can do it again- KSSSTT PRRBBT
